name: Parking School: City Car Skill
description:
Parking School: City Car Skill is new latest game fast speed car parking game. Drive intense prado car around the car parking lot to pass the missions in the fastest time you can. Our smash hit Multi Level prado Car Parking Simulator game is back with an all-new sequel, bigger and better than ever. Unlike other games, we offer you a car parking games with superior quality graphics, easy parking management with high precision, and different camera angles to drive a car and a beautiful vehicle view.this will give you a full real-like feeling. So we offer, you realistic experience at a high level.
Features:
- Challenging levels
- High quality graphics
- Realistic driving experience
- Smooth and real prado car control
- Different Camera Angle to park according in a 3D HD Environment
- Parking place with new and updated animations.
